summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2016 CHRYSLER TOWN AND COUNTRY. CONTACT STATED CAR KEPT MAKING AGGRESSIVE JERKS (SEEMED LIKE WHILE IT WAS SHIFTING GEARS). WHILE AT A STOP LIGHT, THE VEHICLE WOULD NOT ACCELERATE FORWARD AND THE CHECK ENGINE INDICATOR ILLUMINATED. THE VEHICLE WAS TOWED TO LINDSEY CHRYSLER (8100 CENTREVILLE RD, MANASSAS, VA) WHERE IT WAS DIAGNOSED THAT THE TRANSMISSION AND HYDRAULIC PUMP WERE FAULTY. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 61,000.  *BF *JB
